title: Check Listing Syndication Status
description: A seller calls, worried that their new listing is not showing up on Zillow. The agent needs to investigate.

tasks.description: Confirm the listing is active in the MLS.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent verifies the listing status is 'Active'.

tasks.description: Check the MLS's syndication settings to ensure feeds to third-party sites like Zillow are enabled.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms that syndication to Zillow is active for the brokerage.

tasks.description: Advise the seller that syndication can sometimes take 24-48 hours to update and that you will re-check tomorrow.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a clear explanation and sets a follow-up task for themselves.
